text: Rachel Green is a fictional character on the American sitcom Friends. She is portrayed by Jennifer Aniston. Green worked as a waitress at Central Perk. Then she worked in Bloomingdales as an assistant. Then she was a manager of a Ralph Lauren company. She was divorced two times, one she left her fianc√© at the altar. She has a daughter Emma. In the series finale she ends up having a relationship with Ross Geller. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1994 Category:Friends characters
title: Rachel Green
